Topic.Title: Why don't Squiffy show the sections and passages I have?

Posts.EditableText: I'm new to this, but I'm making something in Squiffy, and when I preview the gamebook I'm making, I have content in my new section but it **won't show up**! What do I do?
Posts.HTML: I'm new to this, but I'm making something in Squiffy, and when I preview the gamebook I'm making, I have content in my new section but it won't show up! What do I do?

Posts.EditableText: What does the script your using look like?
Posts.HTML: What does the script your using look like?

Posts.EditableText:
Well, we kind of need to see the code for a complete understanding, but it may be one of three reasons:

1. The link text does not match due to a spelling mistake (E.G. [Start] and [Strat])
2. You might have forgotten to add ":" to the end, like this:
```
[[Start]]

[[Start]] <-- ":" goes here 
Text for section link.
```
3. You may have forgotton to do double brackets around one.
However, we will need your code to be 100% certain.
